amendment.description: To provide for the use of not less than $3,000,000 by the Bridge Fund for certain programs in Tibet.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2021 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2021 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Brownback. (consideration: CR S13372; text: CR S13372) To provide for the use of not less than $3,000,000 by the Bridge Fund for certain programs in Tibet.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2021 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Brownback.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2021 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
